install.name: JWallpapers next and previous module
install.author: Arunas Mazeika
install.copyright: Copyright (C) 2010 Arunas Mazeika - All rights reserved
install.description: A module to display the next and previous pictures based on the position and the category of the picture being displayed

param.name: target_new_window
param.label: Show picture details in a new window ?
param.description: If set to Yes, the detailed picture view will be shown in a new window when a thumbnail from the module is clicked. Otherwise the view will be shown in the same window. The same applies to the more pics link

param.name: thumbs_columns
param.label: Number of columns
param.description: Number of columns for thumbnails display

param.name: thumbs_lines
param.label: Number of lines
param.description: Number of lines for thumbnails display

param.name: thumbs_width
param.label: Thumb width (px)
param.description: Use this field to override the size of the thumbs in order to make them look smaller. The given width will be used instead of the real thumb size defined in the main component settings

param.name: thumbs_height
param.label: Thumb height (px)
param.description: Use this field to override the size of the thumbs in order to make them look smaller. The given height will be used instead of the real thumb size defined in the main component settings
